task.title: Project Members: Adding New Members
task.shortdesc: Project administrators and project editors can add new users to projects.

step.cmd: Go to the Project members column on the right side of the project dashboard and click on Add new member.
Enter the CWRC user name of the person you would like to add.
step.info: In this form you can also send them a “Welcome message” and define the CWRC role within the project. Only project administrators can add additional project admin members.
